DOC.brief_summary: This trial examine analgesia fibula free flap donor site peri-neuronal catheter oro-pharyngeal carcinoma surgery compare continuous infusion local anesthetic systemic multimodal analgesia .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesia Fibula Free Flap Donor Site Peri-Neuronal Catheter Oro-Pharyngeal Carcinoma Surgery
DOC.criteria: Adult patient schedule oropharyngeal carcinoma surgery reconstruction fibula free flap Allergy propofol local anesthetic ( ropivacaine ) Severe renal cardiac failure
